value: 'AUSTRALIA SQUARE TOWER' LEVEL 25 264-278 GEORGE STREET, SYDNEY, 2000, NSW, Australia

6282 - Investment Advice Summary > PLATO INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LIMITED (formerly PALLADIUM CAPITAL INVESTORS LIMITED) is an Australian public company. Its operations cover management investment offices, open-end. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. PLATO INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LIMITED is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by managing director Donald Frank Hamson. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $31.77 million. Its net profit totalled $12.69 million. PLATO INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT LIMITED forms part of the finance, insurance, and real estate industry sector.
